isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 550 AND TU-FLO 750 - DISASSEMBLE - CONNECTING ROD

svcproc.title: CONNECTING ROD
svcproc.para: Before removing the connecting rod, mark the connecting rods (Item 37) and their caps (Item 39) to ensure correct reassembly. The connecting rod and cap are a matched set, therefore the caps must not be switched or rotated end for end.

step1.para: Remove the connecting rod bolts (Item 40) and bearing caps (Item 39).
Push the pistons (Item 26) with the connecting rods (Item 37) attached out the top of the cylinder bore of the crankcase. Replace the bearing caps on the connecting rods.

If the piston is removed from the rod, inspect the wrist pin bore in the piston and bronze wrist pin bushing (Item 36) in the connecting rod. If excessive wear is noted or suspected, replace the connecting rod and piston.
